messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Hello, dear Station Crew. I am your current captain, Jim Cox.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Because of the random extra clown on the station, whom i have no idea how they got on. security roles will be insta accepted.. unless you are a clown, or have clown expeirence.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: As the captain has annoyed the fuck out of me, i quit. whoever gets to me first gets my ID. ill be standing near the HOP line

messages.author: T.H.E.R.M.O.S (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Goodbye crew, please have a nice day.</font>
